DataElement.preferredName: Body Image Scale Past Few Weeks Assessment Of Physical Attractiveness Of Self Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much they have had a feeling of being less physically attractive due to their disease or treatment in the past few weeks, using a four point Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Body Image Scale Past Few Weeks Assessment Of Physical Attractiveness Of Self Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A brief questionnaire for assessing body image changes in patients with cancer._Past; before the present time._An indefinite but relatively small number._Any period of seven consecutive days._A person's stated observation of their feeling of being less physically attractive as a result of their disease or treatment._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A brief questionnaire for assessing body image changes in patients with cancer.

Concepts.definition: A brief questionnaire for assessing body image changes in patients with cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past Few Week Assessment of Physical Attractiveness of Self Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:An indefinite but relatively small number.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:A person's stated observation of their feeling of being less physically attractive as a result of their disease or treatment.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: An indefinite but relatively small number.
Any period of seven consecutive days.

Concepts.longName: Feel Physically Less Attractive as Result of Disease or Treatment
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual feels or has felt less physically attractive as a result of their disease or treatment.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
